title: Tailwind CSS Unit Reference & Converter
subtitle: Explore Tailwind’s consistent unit scale for spacing, typography, and responsive breakpoints. Instantly see their equivalent pixel values.
referenceValuesDescription: Tailwind’s design system is based on a 4px spacing scale, rem-based font sizes, and mobile-first breakpoints.

referenceValues.title: Spacing scale
referenceValues.description: Built on a 4px base grid. Each unit (like p-4 or m-6) increases in 4px steps.

referenceValues.title: Font scale
referenceValues.description: Uses typographic proportions — each step roughly 1.125× larger than the previous.

referenceValues.title: Breakpoints
referenceValues.description: Follow a mobile-first approach — meaning styles apply upward from the breakpoint.

funFacts.title: Design Consistency
funFacts.description: The rem and px mappings make spacing and typography predictable across devices.

funFacts.title: Customization Power
funFacts.description: You can redefine the entire spacing or font scale in `tailwind.config.js` for brand-specific systems.

funFacts.title: Responsive Freedom
funFacts.description: Tailwind breakpoints are designed for common screen widths but can be fully customized.
